elements.element_text:
Current → devOps

During the second career my team at Infinea was one of the first adopters (2014) of Micro-service Orchestration using K8s(Kubernetes) as a CiCd & highly-available architecture.

Infinea was shut down completely as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic. All employees were retrenched.

I used “COVID-19” slack time to focus on the lessons learned in the K8s devOps space & refined the related thinking, opportunities, processes and paradigms.

I ran various international consulting projects on-line and was subsequently employed on a fixed term contract basis by Prevoire' in May 2021.
My role was to establish a devOps team and culture for their new software development projects.
This App focuses entirely on my DevOps career.

Middle Career → Software Development

..Built and deployed host of systems and/or applications.
..Managed various Development and Analysis teams.
Progressed to the science of devOps and the management processes and changes required for effective Micro-service Orchestration.
(February 1990 to April 2020. i.e. 30.2 years)
My earlier career resume is available on the BIOGRAPHYmenu item (linked In).

First Career → SA Air-Force (SAAF)

Officer - General Duties, Flying, e-Warfare, Captured Weapons Specialist, Airspace Command and Control & Weapons Systems Engineering.
Attained Degree: Bsc(Mill)(Aero) - University of Stellenbosch
Honorably discharged with rank of Major
(June 1979 to Jan 1990. i.e. 10.5 years)

Where appropriate I have depicted the Architectural considerations.

I list the Technologies Tools, Tool-sets or Services typically used in effective Micro-service Orchestration by SRE practitioners.
I indicate my personal involvement and level of expertise in each technology.
Any term referred to in any of the above technologies but not specifically listed or explained.
